column1: Electronic and Electrical Engineering with Industry, MSc
column3: School of Aerospace, Civil, Electrical And Mechanical Engineering
column5: Electronic and Electrical Engineering with Industry Course OverviewOur MSc Electronic and Electrical Engineering with Industry course is only open to International students.There is a selection process for this course - see the 'how to apply' section on this page. Gain two years' experience in the UK and the opportunity to work in collaboration with industry on a real-life challenge.This new MSc is an extension of our MSc Electronic and Electrical Engineering and includes a second year allowing you to undertake either an industry placement or an industry-focused project with an industrial partner.
column9: 2 Years Full Time With a Year In Industry
